function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of outdoor spaces for socialization and physical distancing","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Design and prioritize outdoor spaces, such as balconies, to support physical distancing and socialization","Technologies":"Biophilic design, outdoor space planning","People":"Apartment residents, public","Owner":"Architects, urban planners"},{"Description":"Inadequate unit sizes and layouts for physical distancing","Impact":"Difficulty in maintaining physical distance within dwellings, leading to increased risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Re-examine apartment layouts and provide sufficient space for physical distancing within dwellings","Technologies":"Apartment layout design, spatial planning","People":"Apartment residents, families","Owner":"Architects, property developers"},{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation and indoor environmental quality","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor contagion and compromised health","Mitigation":"Utilize passive design strategies, provide operable windows, and limit building height to improve indoor environmental quality","Technologies":"Passive design strategies, operable window systems","People":"Apartment residents","Owner":"Architects, building developers"}]}
